Scripts.OnLoad: SW_ChkRegister(this, "", false, "PF"); this.petFil = {Active = true, latePets = true};
SW_ChkRegister(this, "", false, "PF"); this.petFil = {Current = true, latePets = true};
SW_ChkRegister(this, "", false, "PF"); this.petFil = {VPP = true, latePets = true};
SW_ChkRegister(this, "", false, "PF"); this.petFil = {VPR = true, latePets = true};
SW_ChkRegister(this, "", false, "PF"); this.petFil = {Ignore = true, latePets = true};
